Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $14000. I am confident this price reflects both the value of the product and provides you with an attractive opportunity. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of us working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
